Title: WorkflowManager
Description: Provides a set of controls for managing workflows hosted by Windows Workflow Foundation in ASP.NET web applications. The framework provides support for workflow-wiring with a minimal need for code.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Provides a set of controls for managing workflows hosted by Windows Workflow Foundation in ASP.NET web applications. The framework provides support for workflow-wiring with a minimal need for code.

Disclaimer
The project is in an early stage of planning/development. It's not stable and certainly not complete!
Please add suggestions and requests in the discussions.

Requirements
  • Microsoft .NET Framework 3.0
  • Visual Studio 2005 extensions for .NET Framework 3.0

Examples
  • WorkflowManager markup
